promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young strong lizard water-type pokemon wearing a ornate mask. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Maskigail, a a chibi young strong lizard water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Groovy Dance. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lizard", "water" or "Maskigail". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, lizard-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sparkling blue background
generatedDescription: This playful aqua-reptile thrives in rippling habitats, exhibiting agile grace. Maskigail captivates others with its Groovy Dance, spreading joy.
